mapper.select: select t.topic_id, t.question, t.choice, t.topic_type, t.correct_answer, t.score, t.difficulty, t.analysis, t.create_date, t.update_date from t_topic t left join exam_topic et on t.topic_id = et.topic_id where et.exam_id = #{examId}
select topic_id, question, choice, topic_type, correct_answer, score, difficulty, analysis, create_date, update_date from t_topic where topic_id = #{topicId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_topic(question, choice, topic_type, correct_answer, score, difficulty, analysis, create_date, update_date) values(#{question},#{choice}, #{topicType}, #{correctAnswer}, #{score}, #{difficulty}, #{analysis}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate})
mapper.update:
update t_topic
question = #{question},
choice = #{choice},
topic_type = #{topicType},
correct_answer = #{correctAnswer},
score = #{score},
difficulty = #{difficulty},
analysis = #{analysis},
create_date = #{createDate},
update_date = #{updateDate},
where topic_id = #{topicId}
